message.body: How was the car ride girl?
Not only did I get to watch my boyfriend cater to the every whim of his ex, I catered to them too... Yeesh. I cried when we were finally just together just bc I've been so tense
Yikes, well hopefully it will only get easier - two days at an isolated cabin can't do the situation too good
No it's fine. Just repressed so much and had to act like all was normal. I'm not great at hiding. Said the L word...
Did he say the L word? Ps you did really good this weekend, handling all of thay
I said "I think I love you" he said "I know I love you
Yep. It seemed like besides Katie that most people have grown up enough to respect each others choices ie Sofie and Ross
Yep and just in general it felt less tense than normal
I felt that way too so I guess that's saying a lot.
Good morning :) how was your flight?
Good morning!! Flight was good, now its catch up time!
You'll be great. Good to be back?
It was really good once I got back to my apartment and even better once I got to work. It's a bit like family - I just needed space to realize how good I have
Oh fine. Can I call you or are you busy?
